mapper.insert: insert into t_product ( name, product_type_id, pleased, sale_price, member_price, image, state, specification, color, inventory, shop_id, can_use, barcode ) values ( #{name}, #{productTypeId}, #{pleased}, #{salePrice}, #{memberPrice}, #{image}, #{state}, #{specification}, #{color}, #{inventory}, #{shopId}, #{canUse}, #{barCode} )
mapper.update:
update t_product
product_type_id = #{productTypeId},
name = #{name},
barcode = #{barCode},
image = #{image},
pleased = #{pleased},
sale_price = #{salePrice},
member_price = #{memberPrice},
specification=#{specification},
color=#{color},
state = #{state}
where id= #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, pleased, barcode barCode, sale_price salePrice, member_price memberPrice, image, state, specification, color, inventory from t_product WHERE id=#{id}

select count(id)
from t_product WHERE shop_id=#{shopId} and can_use=1
and product_type_id=#{productTypeId}
and name like "%"#{productName}"%"

select p.id, p.name, p.barcode barCode, p.sale_price salePrice, p.member_price memberPrice, p.specification, p.color, p.image, i.quantity quantity FROM t_inventory i JOIN t_product p on i.product_id=p.id WHERE p.shop_id=#{shopId} and p.can_use=1 and p.product_type_id=#{productTypeId} and p.state=1 limit #{page},#{limit}

select p.id, p.name, p.pleased, p.sale_price salePrice, p.barcode barCode, p.member_price memberPrice, p.image, p.state, p.specification, p.color, p.inventory, p.product_type_id productTypeId, pt.product_type productTypeName from t_product p join t_product_type pt on p.product_type_id=pt.id where p.id=#{productId} and p.can_use=1

SELECT p.id, p.name, p.image, p.sale_price salePrice, p.member_price memberPrice, pt.product_type productTypeName, p.specification, p.color, i.quantity quantity FROM t_inventory i JOIN t_product p on i.product_id=p.id left JOIN t_product_type pt on p.product_type_id=pt.id WHERE p.can_use=1 and p.state=1 and p.shop_Id=#{shopId}
